answers.answer: Nop, my blood pressure is perfect! Today was at 114/74
Hmm that's strange. Dr doesn't know why or what it could possibly be?
No! She just told me to cut down on sugars
I'm 21 weeks and I've gained 13 lbs already, she says that its too much weight!
Awe well I'm sorry I was of no help but I'd think it would of been gb or preeclampsia and idk what else it could be sorry
I'm pretty sure I gained a lil more than that at 21 weeks I'm not 32+3 and have gained 27lbs :/
I'm 28 weeks and I have gained 24lbs already and my doctor said he's not concerned at all. It also goes by how much you weighed before your pregnancy
I've done the glucose test 3 times already du to having sugar in urine, and it has been negative!

I don't know why they aren't more concerned. I had a routine urine test with my first son around 20 weeks and there was sugar in mine as well. They immediately sent me to the er to be put on a iv drip. They said my body wasn't breaking down The sugars and proteins the way it should. After that I was seen once a week to keep a.close eye on my kidney/liver functions.
So it could be something serious?

I dont really know bc everyone is different, I hope its not. I mean I guess it could be nothing but my doctors sure seemed concerned. I'd look into it more do some research and see what you find then ask them a lot more questions..

During pregnancy a lot of times there's sugar dumped in urine. It doesn't always indicate that there's something wrong. I'm diabetic and my doc told me that even tho my sugars are normal and very controlled that sugar can still leak in the urine because of being pregnant. That it wasn't something to be majorly concerned about unless it's a fairly large amount

I've had that the last two times I went to the dr too. The nurse just asked me what I had for breakfast and I said cereal and she was like oh ok, that's it. I'm 40 weeks so I should be having my baby any day. I hope the sugar in the urine thing isn't a big deal! For both of us

Sugar is your urine means you've been eating too much sugar!  I had pancakes with lots a syrup for breakfast before my midwife came one day and she gave me the lecture about consuming sugar while pregnant.  I only had high sugar that one day so now I eat pancakes on the days she doesn't come.  Haha.  Just lay off the sugars and it will go down.
With my first I went to the Dr a few times with sugar in my urine. But everything turned out fine. No gestational diabetes or any other problems. Had a very healthy boy
High intake of sugars during pregnancy usually leads to a larger baby.  So if you're delivering naturally lay off the sweets!

question: From my last 3 appts I've been having sugar in urine, I was sent to do the 3 hr glucose test and came back negative, but why would I keep getting sugar in urine? Anyone else the same?
title: sugar in urine??
